description.lang: The product is a Z-Wave enabled room thermostatsupport control cool/heat/fan climate in Z-Wavesystem. The desired temperature in the room can beset locally using the button on the front of the unit. Itworks in the same way as a normal room thermostatwith hard wired to the heating source; meanwhilecontrol is achieved using Z-Wave wireless signalsalso. This enables you to control heating times andschedule zone heating.This product can be operated in any Z-Wave networkwith other Z-Wave certified devices from othermanufacturers. All non-battery operated nodes withinthe network will act as repeaters regardless of vendorto increase reliability of the network.

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, is assigned to send thermostat lifeline status to associated devices, including send the multilevel sensor report frameof room temperature, and thermostat mode, fan speed, thermostat state etc. Please note that, external thermostat status is refresh one minute after change by manual locally.
